startLocation.address: Amer Fort, Devisinghpura, Amer, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302001, India

name: The Pink City Explorer
summary: Explore the vibrant culture and rich history of Jaipur, the Pink City of India.
description: Jaipur offers a unique blend of heritage, culture, and modernity. From the majestic Amer Fort to the bustling bazaars, this tour provides an immersive experience of Rajasthan's capital.

startLocation.address: Taj Mahal, Dharmapuri, Forest Colony, Tajganj, Agra, Uttar Pradesh 282001, India

name: The Taj Experience
summary: Experience the timeless beauty of the Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
description: This tour takes you to the heart of India's most iconic monument, the Taj Mahal. Experience the history, architecture, and romance of this UNESCO World Heritage site.

startLocation.address: City Palace, Old City, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001, India

name: Udaipur Serenity
summary: Discover the tranquil beauty and royal heritage of Udaipur, the City of Lakes.
description: Explore the serene lakes, historic palaces, and vibrant markets of Udaipur. This tour provides an insight into the regal history and cultural richness of this stunning city.

startLocation.address: Dashashwamedh Ghat, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh 221001, India

name: Spiritual Varanasi
summary: Experience the spiritual essence of India in the holy city of Varanasi.
description: Varanasi is a city that has been a spiritual center for thousands of years. This tour takes you through the ghats, temples, and narrow lanes of one of India's most ancient cities.

startLocation.address: Shanti Stupa, Leh, Jammu and Kashmir 194101, India

name: Mystic Leh
summary: Explore the rugged landscapes and Buddhist culture of Leh, Ladakh.
description: Leh is a land of stark beauty, with towering mountains, serene monasteries, and a unique culture. This tour offers a deep dive into the mysticism and rugged beauty of Ladakh.

name: Goa Beach Getaway
summary: Enjoy the sun, sand, and sea in the tropical paradise of Goa.
description: Goa is known for its stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and rich cultural heritage. This tour provides a perfect mix of relaxation and adventure.

startLocation.address: Rohtang Pass, Manali, Himachal Pradesh 175103, India

name: Manali Adventure
summary: Experience the thrill of the mountains in Manali, the adventure capital of India.
description: Manali offers a perfect blend of natural beauty and adventure activities. From trekking to paragliding, this tour provides an adrenaline-pumping experience in the Himalayas.

startLocation.address: Mysore Palace, Sayyaji Rao Rd, Agrahara, Chamrajpura, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001, India

name: Mysore Heritage Tour
summary: Explore the royal heritage and cultural richness of Mysore, the City of Palaces.
description: Mysore is renowned for its rich history, majestic palaces, and vibrant cultural festivals. This tour offers an insight into the royal heritage of this beautiful city.

summary: Breathtaking hike through the Canadian Banff National Park
